Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: The posts reflect the contemporary Australian concern about the country's economic and social policies. People discuss having severe financial problems such as affordability of food medicine and housing due to insufficient payments received from the government. Besides there are debates about upcoming budget initiatives. Some of them such as investing in emergency communication technologies are welcomed while others are opposed. In general people believe that the authorities should prioritize their welfare especially of those suffering from disabilities illnesses or unemployment.
